search.name: Setiqueue
search.description:
Directly login as an admin to your setiqueue web admin interface without having the hassle to go through the login page.
Switches:
/server:serveradress - Specify server IP address or name (127.0.0.1 if not specified)
/port:portnumber - Specify port number (5517 if not specified)
Examples:
setiq mypassword
setiq mypassword /server:localhost /port:6000
Warning:
If you are using DQSD v3.0 or earlier and you specify an IP address for the serveraddress parameter, you might need to edit defer_tools.js and change
var re_switch = /\/((\w+)(?::?(\w*)))\s*/;
to
var re_switch = /\/((\w+)(?::?(\S*)))\s*/;
